languages.text: "Вы... правы. Если я не освобожусь сейчас, то навсегда останусь пленницей собственной силы. И чужих страхов". {n}Кассия стискивает медальон в тонкой ладони, и энергия камня резонирует с ее силами, докрасна раскаляя ледяной камень, пока тот с хрустом не рассыпается на осколки. Прикрыв рану, девушка тепло улыбается.{/n} "Вам еще не надоели местные виды? Пора покинуть это место, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Вы... правы. Если я не освобожусь сейчас, то навсегда останусь пленницей собственной силы. И чужих страхов". {n}Кассия стискивает медальон в тонкой ладони, и энергия камня резонирует с ее силами, докрасна раскаляя ледяной камень, пока тот с хрустом не рассыпается на осколки. Прикрыв рану, девушка тепло улыбается.{/n} "Вам еще не надоели местные виды? Пора покинуть это место, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: "It is true... You are right. Unless I free myself now, I will be forever the prisoner of my own power... and the fears of others." {n}Cassia clenches the medallion and its energies resonate with her own. The icy stone begins to glow red with heat until it breaks apart with a resounding crackle. Cassia covers the wound with a hand and smiles warmly.{/n} "Are you not yet tired of the sight of this place? It is time we were on our way, Lord Captain."

Прикрыв рану, девушка тепло улыбается.{/n} "Вам еще не надоели местные виды? Пора покинуть это место, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "It is true... you are right. If I do not free myself now, I will be forever the prisoner of my own power... and the fears of others." {n}Cassia clenches the medallion, and its energies resonate with her own. The icy stone begins to glow red with heat until it breaks apart with a resounding crack. Cassia covers the wound with a hand and smiles warmly.{/n} "Are you not yet tired of the sight of this place? It is time we were on our way, Lord Captain."

languages.text: 「そう…あなたの言う通りです。今すぐ自分を解放しない限り、私は自分自身の力の捕らわれ人となるでしょう…他人にとっては恐怖そのものです」{n}カシアがメダルを握り締めると、そのエネルギーが彼女自身のエネルギーと共鳴する。氷のような石が熱で赤く輝き始め、パチンと音を立てて砕け散る。カシアは傷口を手で覆い、温かく微笑む。{/n}「この場所にももう飽きましたよね？そろそろ行きましょう、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "It is true... You are right. Unless I free myself now, I will be forever the prisoner of my own power... and the fears of others." {n}Cassia clenches the medallion and its energies resonate with her own. The icy stone begins to glow red with heat until it breaks apart with a resounding crackle. Cassia covers the wound with a hand and smiles warmly.{/n} "Are you not yet tired of the sight of this place? It is time we were on our way, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「そう…あなたの言う通りです。今すぐ自分を解放しない限り、私は自分自身の力の捕らわれ人となるでしょう…他人にとっては恐怖そのものです」{n}カシアがメダルを握り締めると、そのエネルギーが彼女自身のエネルギーと共鳴する。氷のような石が熱で赤く輝き始め、パチンと音を立てて砕け散る。カシアは傷口を手で覆い、温かく微笑む。{/n}「この場所にももう飽きましたよね？そろそろ行きましょう、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: “是这样的……你说得没错。除非我现在重获自由，否则我永远会被自己的力量囚禁着……永远生活在他人的恐惧之中。”{n}卡西娅握紧了胸前的石块，随后，那块冰冷的石头散发着热量，发出了红色的光芒，最后彻底裂开，发出“啪”的一声。卡西娅捂住了伤口，露出了温暖的笑容。{/n}“你还没有厌倦这个地方吗，舰长大人？咱们该出发了。”
languages.original_text: "It is true... You are right. Unless I free myself now, I will be forever the prisoner of my own power... and the fears of others." {n}Cassia clenches the medallion and its energies resonate with her own. The icy stone begins to glow red with heat until it breaks apart with a resounding crackle. Cassia covers the wound with a hand and smiles warmly.{/n} "Are you not yet tired of the sight of this place? It is time we were on our way, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “是这样的……你说得没错。除非我现在重获自由，否则我永远会被自己的力量囚禁着……永远生活在他人的恐惧之中。”{n}卡西娅握紧了胸前的石块，随后，那块冰冷的石头散发着热量，发出了红色的光芒，最后彻底裂开，发出“啪”的一声。卡西娅捂住了伤口，露出了温暖的笑容。{/n}“你还没有厌倦这个地方吗，舰长大人？咱们该出发了。”

languages.text: «Es verdad... Tiene razón. A menos que me libere ahora, seré siempre una prisionera de mi propio poder... y de los miedos de los demás». {n}Cassia aferra el medallón y las energías del objeto resuenan con las suyas. La gélida piedra comienza a brillar al rojo vivo hasta que se rompe con un sonoro crujido. Cassia cubre la herida con una mano y sonríe con calidez.{/n} «¿Aún no se ha cansado de ver este lugar? Ya es hora de que sigamos nuestro camino, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "It is true... You are right. Unless I free myself now, I will be forever the prisoner of my own power... and the fears of others." {n}Cassia clenches the medallion and its energies resonate with her own. The icy stone begins to glow red with heat until it breaks apart with a resounding crackle. Cassia covers the wound with a hand and smiles warmly.{/n} "Are you not yet tired of the sight of this place? It is time we were on our way, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Es verdad... Tiene razón. A menos que me libere ahora, seré siempre una prisionera de mi propio poder... y de los miedos de los demás». {n}Cassia aferra el medallón y las energías del objeto resuenan con las suyas. La gélida piedra comienza a brillar al rojo vivo hasta que se rompe con un sonoro crujido. Cassia cubre la herida con una mano y sonríe con calidez.{/n} «¿Aún no se ha cansado de ver este lugar? Ya es hora de que sigamos nuestro camino, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: "Es ist wahr ... Ihr habt recht. Wenn ich mich jetzt nicht selbst befreie, dann werde ich für immer eine Gefangene meiner eigenen Kräfte sein ... und der Ängste anderer." {n}Cassia umklammert das Medaillon, und seine Energien resonieren mit ihrer eigenen. Der eiskalte Stein beginnt vor Hitze rot zu glühen, bis er mit einem lauten Knacken zerbricht. Cassia bedeckt die Wunde mit einer Hand und lächelt warm.{/n} "Seid Ihr den Anblick dieser Hölle nicht langsam leid? Es wird Zeit, dass wir weiterziehen, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "It is true... You are right. Unless I free myself now, I will be forever the prisoner of my own power... and the fears of others." {n}Cassia clenches the medallion and its energies resonate with her own. The icy stone begins to glow red with heat until it breaks apart with a resounding crackle. Cassia covers the wound with a hand and smiles warmly.{/n} "Are you not yet tired of the sight of this place? It is time we were on our way, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist wahr ... Ihr habt recht. Wenn ich mich jetzt nicht selbst befreie, dann werde ich für immer eine Gefangene meiner eigenen Kräfte sein ... und der Ängste anderer." {n}Cassia umklammert das Medaillon, und seine Energien resonieren mit ihrer eigenen. Der eiskalte Stein beginnt vor Hitze rot zu glühen, bis er mit einem lauten Knacken zerbricht. Cassia bedeckt die Wunde mit einer Hand und lächelt warm.{/n} "Seid Ihr den Anblick dieser Hölle nicht langsam leid? Es wird Zeit, dass wir weiterziehen, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « C'est vrai... Vous avez raison. Si je ne me libère pas maintenant, je demeurerai à jamais prisonnière de mon propre pouvoir... et n'inspirerai jamais rien d'autre que la crainte. » {n}Cassia serre le médaillon dans sa main et entre en résonance avec les énergies qu'il renferme. La pierre glaciale se met à chauffer jusqu'à devenir incandescente avant de se briser complètement. La navigatrice couvre la blessure d'une main, un sourire chaleureux aux lèvres.{/n} « N'en avez-vous pas assez de cet endroit ? Nous devrions nous en aller d'ici, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "It is true... You are right. Unless I free myself now, I will be forever the prisoner of my own power... and the fears of others." {n}Cassia clenches the medallion and its energies resonate with her own. The icy stone begins to glow red with heat until it breaks apart with a resounding crackle. Cassia covers the wound with a hand and smiles warmly.{/n} "Are you not yet tired of the sight of this place? It is time we were on our way, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai... Vous avez raison. Si je ne me libère pas maintenant, je demeurerai à jamais prisonnière de mon propre pouvoir... et n'inspirerai jamais rien d'autre que la crainte. » {n}Cassia serre le médaillon dans sa main et entre en résonance avec les énergies qu'il renferme. La pierre glaciale se met à chauffer jusqu'à devenir incandescente avant de se briser complètement. La navigatrice couvre la blessure d'une main, un sourire chaleureux aux lèvres.{/n} « N'en avez-vous pas assez de cet endroit ? Nous devrions nous en aller d'ici, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: "Doğru... Haklısın. Kendimi şimdi özgür kılmazsam, daima kendi gücümün ve başkalarının korkusunun esiri olacağım." {n}Cassia madalyonu eliyle sıkıca tutarken madalyonun enerjisi, kendi enerjisiyle yankılanıyor. Buzu andıran taş ısına ısına kızarıyor, ardından da çınlayan bir çatırtıyla parçalara ayrılıyor. Cassia bir elini yaranın üzerine götürüp içtenlikle gülümsüyor.{/n} "Buradan sıkılmadın mı henüz? Gidelim artık Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "It is true... You are right. Unless I free myself now, I will be forever the prisoner of my own power... and the fears of others." {n}Cassia clenches the medallion and its energies resonate with her own. The icy stone begins to glow red with heat until it breaks apart with a resounding crackle. Cassia covers the wound with a hand and smiles warmly.{/n} "Are you not yet tired of the sight of this place? It is time we were on our way, Lord Captain."

Buzu andıran taş ısına ısına kızarıyor, ardından da çınlayan bir çatırtıyla parçalara ayrılıyor. Cassia bir elini yaranın üzerine götürüp içtenlikle gülümsüyor.{/n} "Buradan sıkılmadın mı henüz? Gidelim artık Lord Kaptan."
